about_the_game:
Danger Ramps is inspired by classic 3D platformer games, but you play with a vehicle. Master control of your vehicle to navigate through colorful environments, collecting items without flipping over or falling into abysses.

  • Your vehicle has enhanced physics; improve your driving skills to progress in the game.
  • Explore vibrant scenarios featuring their own obstacles and challenges.
  • Collect the golden stars and all the black stars to advance to the next level.
  • Avoid flip over and defy gravity while traversing ramps and chasms.
  • Increase your score with each playthrough.

Some game considerations:

  • This is not a long game; however, advancing to the next level shouldn't be too easy.
  • Learning to control the vehicle is part of the game's mechanics.
  • It's possible to play it perfectly using only one hand on the keyboard.
  • Optimized for Xbox One controller. You can control acceleration and reverse using the controller's triggers.
